content.question: Scholars have theorized that Rarotonga staff gods embodied male and female power based primarily on the

choices.label: portraits of specific male and female rulers painted on the bark cloth wrapper
inclusion of hundreds of feathers from male and female frigate birds
combination of carving made by men and textiles made by women
written dedication to a specific pair of high-ranking male and female leaders

content.answer: combination of carving made by men and textiles made by women

topic.text: 9.3: Theories and Interpretations of Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how one or more art historically valid interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art) are derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, and/or meaning.
